artefact: Explosives manufacturing and storage licence (England, Scotland and Wales)

artefact.overview: You need a licence to manufacture or store explosives
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to manufacture or store explosives.
artefact.licence_overview: If you manufacture or store explosives, you must have a licence from the [Health and Safety Executive (HSE),](http://www.hse.gov.uk/ "Health and Safety Executive"){:rel="external"} the police or your local licensing authority.
